title: There Is No Happy Ending - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Arrogant Characters   Charismatic Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Love Triangles   Nobles   Royalty   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 삼오
description:
Bianca Morning and Bliss Winston were the golden couple of the century among the Palbon socialites.

At the same time, they were also a show-window couple who tricked everyone.

Bianca thought that a perfect future would await her.

Until one day, she heard a strange rumor.

“It is rumored that the young lady’s fiance, Her Majesty Duke Bliss Winston, is seeing another woman.”

The rumors were true.>
